NDT.MI.summary: Neodecortech S.p.A. produces and markets decorative papers for industrial sectors in Italy, Europe, Asia, the United States, and internationally. The company offers printed decorative papers, printed and melamine-impregnated papers, and finish-foils primarily for the furniture, laminate flooring, and camper/caravan segments under the Confalonieri brand; and paper-based laminates for covering, door, and surface segments under the Texte brand. It also provides plastic printed films and plastic printed laminated films for LVT flooring under the Plana. The company was founded in 1947 and is headquartered in Filago, Italy.

RDM.MC.summary: Reno De Medici S.p.A. produces and distributes carton boards primarily in Europe. The company operates through White Lined Chipboard and Folding Box Board segments. It offers coated recycled carton boards; folding virgin fiber carton boards; and carton boards for specialties and luxury packaging. The company was founded in 1967 and is based in Milan, Italy. Reno De Medici S.p.A. is a subsidiary of Cascades Inc.
